description: Detects changes to the registry for the currently logged-in user. In order to disable PowerShell module logging, script block logging or transcription and script execution logging
author: frack113
name: PowerShell Logging Disabled Via Registry Key Tampering
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\.*/) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Hh][Ee][Aa][Dd][Ee][Rr]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ss]/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000000\)/)
